function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Imbalance of research participants affecting study findings","Impact":"Potential bias in research findings","Mitigation":"Ensure balanced representation of genders in research participants","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Correlation between gender, age, and other characteristics and attitudes towards COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for discrimination or bias in interpreting attitudes","Mitigation":"Use diverse and representative samples for studying COVID-19 attitudes","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research team, public health officials"},{"Description":"Positive correlation between knowledge and attitudes towards COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of assuming causation without evidence","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to establish causal relationship","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research team, public health professionals"}]}
